identity.philosophy: Functional Brutalism meets Electric Utility. No generic gradients. High contrast. Deep blacks.
rules: No 'Inter' for headings. Use heavy weights.
No 100% symmetrical grids. Use masonry/staggered layouts.
Dark mode is not just black (#000000). Use Deep Obsidian (#0A0A0A) + rich grays.
Primary action color must be electric (Acid Lime), not 'SaaS Blue'.

general.description: All components must use React Native StyleSheet. No inline styles for core layouts.
general.safeArea: Always wrap screen content in SafeAreaView or handle insets manually.

empty_state.description: Abstract Cubes - Use for Empty Notes State

search_bg.description: Cyan Sound Wave - Use for AI Search / Processing Background

voice_visualizer.description: Blue Light Wave - Use for Voice Recording Overlay

universal_guidelines: Do not use generic 'Button' component. Build custom TouchableOpacity with the styles provided.
For the Masonry Layout: Split the notes data into two arrays (even/odd indices) and render two side-by-side Columns inside a ScrollView.
Voice Note Recording: Use the 'voice_visualizer' image as a background with opacity when recording is active.
Accessibility: Ensure all TouchableOpacity elements have 'accessibilityLabel' and 'accessibilityRole'.
Testing: Add 'testID' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, list items) using kebab-case (e.g., 'save-note-btn').
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Setup: Ensure 'react-native-safe-area-context' and 'expo-image' are correctly used.
2. Theme: Apply the Dark Mode colors globally. There is no Light Mode toggle for MVP.
3. Navigation: Use Expo Router. Create a Stack layout. Hiding header on 'Home' might look cleaner.
4. Components: Create a 'ThemedText' and 'ThemedView' wrapper if helpful, but sticking to StyleSheet objects is fine.
5. Masonry Grid: Implement a custom 2-column view logic for the notes feed to achieve the 'Pinterest' look.
6. AI Features: When AI is generating metadata, show a subtle pulsing animation on the card using Animated API.
